# Setup
```{r setup}
library(multiAnalysis)
set.seed(123)
block_name <- "t_drugs"
hc_method <- "ward.D2"
hc_metric <- "spearman"
hc_index <- "silhouette"
k <- 2
n_boot <- 1000
MAX_CLUSTERS <- 10
colors_k <- get_colors()[seq(k) + 2]
```
